pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, August 25, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will participate in a briefing on COVID-19 with the Minister of Health, Patty Hajdu, and the Chief Public Health Officer of Canada, Dr. Theresa Tam.

The Prime Minister will participate in a briefing on wildfires with the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, Bill Blair.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Jacinda Ardern.
